content: The Fungiwoman is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong, though she is not officially tracked as a yaoguai chief in your journal. Located in the Temple of Yellow Flowers on a high hill, she hides among Monkey-Head Mushrooms.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fungiwoman.md', within the main section titled 'Fungiwoman'.
The content is as follows:
The Fungiwoman is an optional Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you can find during Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong, though she is not officially tracked as a yaoguai chief in your journal. Located in the Temple of Yellow Flowers on a high hill, she hides among Monkey-Head Mushrooms.
